title: Emoji Picker
setup_done_cinna:
✅ Keyboard shortcut successfully set.

You can now launch the Emoji Picker with Super+.

🔁 Tip: If it doesn't work immediately, press Alt+F2, type `r`, and press Enter.
setup_fail_text:
‼️ Error during setup.

Please open keyboard shortcuts and add the Emoji Picker manually.
setup_not_available:
🛠 Automatic setup not available.

➡️ Please add a keyboard shortcut manually:
    • Command: emoji-picker
    • Shortcut: <Super+>.
set_desk_unknown: 🚫 Desktop environment not recognised. Please configure manually.
setup_done_xfce_gno:
✅ Keyboard shortcut successfully set.

You can now launch the Emoji Picker with Super+.
set_key_tooltip:
Note:
Default: Super+.
Custom combinations should be configured in your desktop environment.
close_window_get: Automatically close the window after selecting an emoji
close_window_dnd: Keep window open during drag & drop
debug_main_settings_infofenster: The following settings were loaded for the info window
debug_shortcut_set_info_window: Setup displayed and noted in settings.ini
debug_shortcut_cinna_already_done: Emoji Picker already registered, found in
debug_gtk_theme_kde_gtk_fallback: was not fully recognised. Using instead
